title: London/Westminster
name: The Speaker
image: https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:The Speaker Pub, Great Peter Street, SW1 - geograph.org.uk - 727826.jpg
content: A pub for local workers, including many civil servants and the odd Parliamentarian.  The Parliament theme includes political caricatures on the walls.  Markets itself as a real pub, with no fruit machines, music or television screens.  Guest beers change every month.
